item.title: Styx: Blades of Greed announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/styx-blades-of-greed-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

Publisher Nacon and developer Cyanide Studio have announced stealth action game sequel Styx: Blades of Greed for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). It will launch this fall.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nacon:

The infamous, sharp-witted goblin Styx makes his grand return in a third installment, revealed in an all-new trailer. Developed once again by Cyanide Studio, Styx: Blades of Greed is a blend of stealth, action and strategy set in a vertically expansive medieval fantasy world. Staying true to its winning formula, the game offers open-ended environments, a vast range of powers and tools, and multiple approaches to completing objectives. The mission? Steal Quartz, a rare and magical resource, while eliminating enemies with skill and precision.

item.title: RENNSPORT coming to PS5, Xbox Series in 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/rennsport-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-in-2025

  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Currently in Early Access for PC.

Nacon will release PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions of Competition Company and Teyon-developed racing simulation game RENNSPORT in 2025, the company announced.

RENNSPORT first launched in Early Access for PC via Epic Games Store on July 10, 2024, followed by Steam on December 16, 2024. It is expected to leave Early Access sometime in 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nacon:

Racing fans, get ready! Rennsport, the ultra-realistic racing simulator developed by Competition Company & Teyon, is showcased in a brand-new trailer. Using advanced photogrammetry technology, Rennsport features officially licensed content and cross-platform compatibility, allowing sim-racing enthusiasts to enjoy the same immersive experience together. Additionally, a mobile app enables players to manage their profiles and in-game events seamlessly.

item.title: Nacon and Big Bad Wolf Studio announce adventure game Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/nacon-and-big-bad-wolf-studio-announce-adventure-game-cthulhu-the-cosmic-abyss-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

Publisher Nacon and developer Big Bad Wolf Studio have announced adventure game Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nacon:

Big Bad Wolf, the studio behind the acclaimed narrative games The Council and Vampire: The Masquerade – Swansong, presents Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss, a thrilling investigative adventure inspired by Lovecraft’s universe. In this first-person psychological thriller, players take on the role of Noah, an agent of Ancile, a secret Interpol division specializing in occult cases, as he investigates the mysterious disappearance of miners in the depths of the Pacific Ocean. His quest will lead him to the labyrinthine prison of R’lyeh, an ancient sunken city where Cthulhu is imprisoned. Alongside his AI companion Key, Noah must solve complex puzzles, make choices that will shape his fate, and resist the mind-corrupting influence of Cthulhu.

item.title: Nacon and ACE Team announce co-op horror game The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/nacon-and-ace-team-announce-co-op-horror-game-the-mound-omen-of-cthulhu-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

Publisher Nacon and developer ACE Team have announced cooperative horror game The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nacon:

ACE Team, the studio behind Clash: Artifacts of Chaos and the Zeno Clash series, takes on a new genre with The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu, a first-person horror game with online cooperative play for up to four players. Inspired by Lovecraft’s novella The Mound, this game puts players in the shoes of a squad of conquistadors on an expedition to discover a legendary underground city rumored to hold priceless treasures.

Deep within an eerie and oppressive jungle, players must explore and survive monstrous, otherworldly entities that distort their senses and threaten their sanity… and their lives. Was that sound just an hallucination? Am I losing my mind and attacking my ally, or is there truly a hostile creature lurking in the shadows? As players venture deeper into the jungle, only teamwork will ensure they make it back alive.
